name: usage-table
title: Usage Table
description: Per-model LLM usage with token counts, cache reads, and API cost

files.content:
"use client" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils" import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableCaption, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, } from "@/components/ui/table" export interface UsageItem { model: string inputWithCache: number inputWithoutCache: number cacheRead: number output: number totalTokens: number apiCost: number costToYou: number } interface UsageTableProps { className?: string title?: string description?: string billingPeriod?: string usageHistory: UsageItem[] showTotal?: boolean } export function UsageTable({ className, title = "Included Usage Summary", description, billingPeriod, usageHistory, showTotal = true, // Default to true }: UsageTableProps) { // Calculate total row if showTotal is true const totalRow = showTotal ? usageHistory.reduce((acc, item) => ({ inputWithCache: acc.inputWithCache + item.inputWithCache, inputWithoutCache: acc.inputWithoutCache + item.inputWithoutCache, cacheRead: acc.cacheRead + item.cacheRead, output: acc.output + item.output, totalTokens: acc.totalTokens + item.totalTokens, apiCost: acc.apiCost + item.apiCost, costToYou: acc.costToYou + item.costToYou, }), { inputWithCache: 0, inputWithoutCache: 0, cacheRead: 0, output: 0, totalTokens: 0, apiCost: 0, costToYou: 0, }) : null const formatNumber = (num: number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat().format(num) } const formatCurrency = (amount: number) => { return `$${amount.toFixed(2)}` } return (
{title}
{billingPeriod && (

Current billing period: {billingPeriod}

)} {description && ( {description} )}
Model usage summary with token counts and costs MODEL INPUT (W/ CACHE WRITE) INPUT (W/O CACHE WRITE) CACHE READ OUTPUT TOTAL TOKENS API COST COST TO YOU {usageHistory.length === 0 && ( No usage data available )} {usageHistory.map((item, index) => ( {item.model} {formatNumber(item.inputWithCache)} {formatNumber(item.inputWithoutCache)} {formatNumber(item.cacheRead)} {formatNumber(item.output)} {formatNumber(item.totalTokens)} {formatCurrency(item.apiCost)} {formatCurrency(item.costToYou)} ))} {showTotal && totalRow && ( Total {formatNumber(totalRow.inputWithCache)} {formatNumber(totalRow.inputWithoutCache)} {formatNumber(totalRow.cacheRead)} {formatNumber(totalRow.output)} {formatNumber(totalRow.totalTokens)} {formatCurrency(totalRow.apiCost)} {formatCurrency(totalRow.costToYou)} )}
) }

import { UsageTable, type UsageItem } from '@/registry/billingsdk/usage-table';

export default function UsageTableDemo() {
  const usageHistory: UsageItem[] = [
    {
      model: 'gpt-5',
      inputWithCache: 0,
      inputWithoutCache: 518131,
      cacheRead: 1646080,
      output: 103271,
      totalTokens: 2267482,
      apiCost: 1.89,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'claude-3.5-sonnet',
      inputWithCache: 176177,
      inputWithoutCache: 28413,
      cacheRead: 434612,
      output: 8326,
      totalTokens: 647528,
      apiCost: 1.00,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'gemini-2.0-flash-exp',
      inputWithCache: 176100,
      inputWithoutCache: 28432,
      cacheRead: 434612,
      output: 8326,
      totalTokens: 647528,
      apiCost: 1.00,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'gemini-2.5-pro',
      inputWithCache: 176177,
      inputWithoutCache: 28413,
      cacheRead: 434612,
      output: 7000,
      totalTokens: 647528,
      apiCost: 1.00,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'claude-4-sonnet',
      inputWithCache: 68415,
      inputWithoutCache: 902,
      cacheRead: 864450,
      output: 12769,
      totalTokens: 946536,
      apiCost: 0.71,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'claude-3.7-sonnet',
      inputWithCache: 68415,
      inputWithoutCache: 902,
      cacheRead: 864450,
      output: 12769,
      totalTokens: 946536,
      apiCost: 0.71,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'auto',
      inputWithCache: 84551,
      inputWithoutCache: 0,
      cacheRead: 284876,
      output: 9458,
      totalTokens: 378885,
      apiCost: 0.23,
      costToYou: 0
    },
    {
      model: 'sonic',
      inputWithCache: 0,
      inputWithoutCache: 149484,
      cacheRead: 4354855,
      output: 23569,
      totalTokens: 4527908,
      apiCost: 0.00,
      costToYou: 0
    }
  ];


  return (
      <UsageTable 
        title="Included Usage Summary"
        usageHistory={usageHistory}
        showTotal={true}
        billingPeriod="Aug 23, 2025 - Sep 23, 2025"
        description="Pro Student comes with at least $20 of included usage per month."
      />
  );
}
